content: SP Assertion Consumer URL (support POST and Redirect binding)

comment.text: The SP Assertion Consumer URL is a required field for setting up Single Sign-On. It should be a URL that supports both POST and Redirect binding methods. This value appears in fields related to Single Sign-On settings, likely within portal configuration or provider metadata sections.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "آليتي" (aliyyatay) should ideally be "طرق" (turuq) to better convey 'methods' in this context. While 'aliyyatay' can mean 'method', 'turuq' is more common and clearer for technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان رابط مُستهلك التأكيد لمزود الخدمة (SP) (يدعم طريقتي POST وRedirect للربط).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "razılığı" translates to "consent" or "agreement", but in this context, it's better to use a term closer to "assertion" or "request". "Assertion" is more technically accurate for SP Assertion Consumer URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP İstehlakçı iddiaları URL (POST və Dolaylı bağlamasını dəstəkləyir)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "İstehlakçı" is correct for "consumer", it might be more readable to use a more familiar or commonly used term, depending on the target audience. Consider if a more accessible term exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP İstifadəçi razılığı URL (POST və Dolaylı bağlamasını dəstəkləyir)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'байдинг' is a transliteration and not a standard Bulgarian term. The correct term for 'binding' in this context would be 'свързване'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: свързване

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'доставчика на услуги' could be slightly more concise.  'на доставчика на услуги' is a bit verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: на доставчика

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "tvrzení" while technically meaning "assertion", might be overly formal or not the most natural way to express it in this context for a general user. "Prohlášení" might be a more accessible alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL spotřebitele prohlášení SP (podpora vazeb POST a přesměrování)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrasing 'vazeb POST a přesměrování' could be slightly more readable as 'vazby POST a přesměrování'. Adding the plural marker 'y' improves flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adresa URL spotřebitele prohlášení SP (podpora vazby POST a přesměrování)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'παρόχου' (provider) might be unnecessary and a bit formal in this context. While technically correct, it makes the sentence slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διεύθυνση URL του καταναλωτή ισχυρισμού (υποστήριξη POST και δέσμευσης ανακατεύθυνσης)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of parenthesis around 'υποστήριξη POST και δέσμευσης ανακατεύθυνσης' could be improved for better readability. It feels slightly disjointed from the main sentence flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διεύθυνση URL του καταναλωτή ισχυρισμού: υποστήριξη POST και δέσμευσης ανακατεύθυνσης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'uudelleenohjausvelvoite' is an awkward and potentially incorrect translation of 'Redirect binding'.  'uudelleenohjaus' is correct for redirect, but 'velvoite' implies an obligation, which isn't the intended meaning. A more accurate translation would convey the function of the redirect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Assertion Consumer URL (POST-tuki ja uudelleenohjaus)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'աջակցում է POST-ին և Redirect պարտադիր է' is not an accurate representation of 'support POST and Redirect binding'. The word 'պարտադիր է' means 'mandatory' or 'required,' implying a restriction, whereas the English text indicates support, not obligation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: աջակցում է POST-ին և Redirect-ին (supports POST and Redirect)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in 'Redirect-ին' feels awkward. While technically valid, it would read more naturally without it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: աջակցում է POST-ին և Redirect-ը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL consumatore asserzione SP' is a literal translation but lacks clarity. 'Assertion Consumer URL' is a technical term best rendered as something more understandable to a broader audience. While technically correct, it may not convey the meaning effectively.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL di ricezione asserzioni SP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'collegamento POST e Reindirizzamento' is technically correct but 'binding' has a specific meaning in the context of Single Sign-On. A more appropriate translation would convey this technical nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: metodo POST e reindirizzamento

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The entire translation feels a bit stiff and overly literal. Consider softening the tone to better align with typical Italian technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL per la ricezione delle asserzioni SP (supporta i metodi POST e di reindirizzamento).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "SP Assertion Consumer URL" is not accurately translated. "ຢືນຢັນ" (yeun yan) translates to "verification" or "confirmation," which isn't the core function of a consumer URL. A better translation would focus on the role of receiving assertions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP ຮັບເອົາ URL ຂອງການຢັ້ງຢືນ (SP reab ao URL khong kan yang yan)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ປ່ຽນເສັ້ນທາງຜູກມັດ" (pian sean tang phook mat) translates to "redirect binding," the term "binding" in this context might be too technical for the target audience. It's better to explain the functionality more simply.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສະຫນັບສະຫນູນການສົ່ງຂໍ້ມູນດ້ວຍ POST ແລະການປ່ຽນເສັ້ນທາງ (sanap sanun kan song khom mun duay POST lae kan pian sean tang)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes Lao script characters, but no indication of punctuation or spacing conventions to match the English.  This may result in display issues depending on the rendering environment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure correct spacing and punctuation based on Lao conventions. Consider adding a space after each Lao word.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "vietrādis" while technically meaning 'location' or 'address', doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Assertion Consumer URL' in a technical context. It feels overly literal and may confuse users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP apgalvojuma patērētāja adrese URL (atbalsta POST un novirzīšanas saistīšanu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using 'URL' after 'adrese' can sound repetitive. It might be more natural to just use 'adrese'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP apgalvojuma patērētāja adrese (atbalsta POST un novirzīšanas saistīšanu)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'SP Assertion Consumer URL' is not accurately translated. 'Usługa konsumenta potwierdzenia' is a bit clunky and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Assertion Consumer URL'.  A more accurate translation might involve incorporating the abbreviation 'SP' or explaining its role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adres URL konsumenta potwierdzenia SP (obsługa powiązań POST i Redirect)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation could benefit from a space after the colon.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adres URL usługi konsumenta potwierdzenia : (obsługa powiązań POST i Redirect)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Asserção por parte do PS ao URL do Consumidor' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'SP Assertion Consumer URL'. 'PS' is likely an abbreviation that needs to be clarified or avoided. 'Assertion Consumer URL' should be translated more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do Consumidor de Asserções (suporta POST e Redirecionamento)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'enlace' (link) is not the best choice here. While technically correct, 'vinculação' or 'binding' would more closely align with the technical meaning in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do Consumidor de Asserções (suporta POST e Redirecionamento)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a parenthetical phrase that doesn't quite match the format of the English. The English is more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do Consumidor de Asserções (suporta POST e Redirecionamento)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ligação de redirecionamento' is a bit clunky. 'Redirecionamento' alone would suffice as it's clear from the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do consumidor de asserção SP (suporte POST e redirecionamento)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Adresa URL a serviciului consumator pentru aserțiune al furnizorului de servicii' is overly literal and not idiomatic Romanian. 'Furnizorului de servicii' is not the best phrasing. 'SP Assertion Consumer URL' is a specific technical term and needs to be translated in a way that conveys that meaning.  'Aserțiune' might also be too technical for the audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-ul de consum al aserțiunii SP (suportă legături POST și redirecționare)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'aserțiune al furnizorului de servicii' has incorrect grammar.  'Al' should be 'a' because 'aserțiune' is feminine.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: aserțiune a furnizorului de servicii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes both 'POST' and 'Redirecționare'. It's beneficial to clarify their nature (binding types) for better understanding. Consider adding a short explanation or using a more descriptive term if appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-ul de consum al aserțiunii SP (suportă legături POST și redirecționare - tipuri de legătură)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the phrase 'URL-адрес службы обработчика утверждений поставщика сервиса' is unnecessary and disrupts readability. It's more natural to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адрес службы обработчика утверждений поставщика сервиса (поддерживаются привязки Redirect и POST)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'SP Assertion Consumer URL' is quite literal and could be improved for a more natural Russian phrasing. 'SP' isn't commonly understood or translated directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адрес для обработки утверждений от поставщика услуг (поддерживаются привязки Redirect и POST)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Assertion Consumer URL' is awkward. 'ප්‍රකාශන පරිභෝජක (AC) ඒ.ස.නි.' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Sinhala. 'Assertion Consumer URL' typically refers to a specific endpoint; a more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrase like 'SP ප්‍රකාශන ප්‍රතිකාරක URL' or 'SP ප්‍රකාශන ප්‍රතිකාරක ලිපිනය'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of abbreviation 'AC' is confusing without explanation.  It's better to avoid abbreviations or briefly explain them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'AC' or add a short explanation like 'ප්‍රකාශන පරිභෝජක (AC) - Assertion Consumer'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'යළි-හැරවීම් බැඳීමට සහාය දක්වයි' is a literal translation of 'support Redirect binding'.  It's not the most natural way to phrase this in Sinhala.  A more fluent option is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Redirect බැඳීම් සඳහා ධාරණය කරයි' or a similar rephrasing that avoids a direct translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'spojenia' (connection) isn't the most accurate representation of 'binding' in this context. 'Binding' refers to the method of transport (POST or Redirect). A more accurate translation would be 'metódy prenosu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL spotrebiteľa vyhlásenia SP (podpora metódy prenosu POST a presmerovania)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "potrošnikov" is not the most accurate translation for "Consumer" in this context. "Potrošnik" refers to a consumer in a purchasing sense. A more accurate translation would be something closer to 'prejemnik' (recipient) or 'obdelovalnik' (processor).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP trditve prejemnikov URL (podporni POST in vezava preusmeritve)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Slovenian phrasing is a bit clunky. 'Vezava preusmeritve' is overly literal. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP trditve prejemnikov URL (podporni POST in preusmeritev)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'потрошача' (potrošača) doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'Consumer' in this context. It translates more directly to 'consumer' in a retail sense. A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'Примач' (Primać) or 'Пријемник' (Prijemnik) which refers to a receiver or acceptor, indicating where the assertion is received.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP URL примача тврдње (потпора за POST и Redirect везивање)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using the Cyrillic alphabet might be a barrier for some users. Consider adding a Latin transliteration in parentheses or as an alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP URL примача тврдње (потпора за POST и Redirect везивање) (SP URL primаča tvrđenje (potpora za POST i Redirect vezivanje))

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'potpora' (support) doesn't accurately translate 'support' in this context. It implies assistance, not the binding method.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP URL potrošača tvrdnji (podrška za POST i Redirect vezivanje)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While generally correct, 'vezivanje' might be slightly too formal for this technical context.  'način' could be considered a more accessible alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP URL potrošača tvrdnji (podrška za POST i Redirect način)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Assertion Consumer' is not accurately translated. 'Tüketici' (consumer) in this context isn't the best equivalent.  'Alıcı' or 'Kabul Eden' would be more appropriate in the context of Single Sign-On.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SP Bildirim Alıcı URL'si (POST ve Yönlendirme bağlamayı destekler)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL-адреса служби обробника тверджень постачальника сервісу" is overly verbose and technical. It's a very literal and complex translation of 'SP Assertion Consumer URL'. A more natural and understandable Ukrainian translation would be something like "URL споживача тверджень постачальника" or "Адреса споживача тверджень постачальника".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL споживача тверджень постачальника

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "зв’язування POST та Redirect" should ideally be more consistently translated. 'Binding' in this context is often represented as 'метод прив'язки'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: метод прив’язки POST та Redirect

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation 'ĐĂNG TẢI' translates to 'UPLOAD' which is not the correct meaning of POST in the context of SP Assertion Consumer URL. It should represent HTTP POST method.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Assertion Consumer (hỗ trợ phương thức POST và chuyển hướng ràng buộc)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ràng buộc' should be followed by a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Assertion Consumer (hỗ trợ phương thức POST và chuyển hướng ràng buộc)
